Detailed Description

Structure used for configuring the TPIU.

Field Documentation

◆ ui32ClockPrescaler

uint32_t am_hal_tpiu_config_t::ui32ClockPrescaler

Desired Clock prescaler value.

◆ ui32ParallelPortSize

uint32_t am_hal_tpiu_config_t::ui32ParallelPortSize

Desired width of the TPIU parallel port.

◆ ui32PinProtocol

uint32_t am_hal_tpiu_config_t::ui32PinProtocol

Protocol to use for the TPIU

Valid values for ui32PinProtocol are:

  • AM_HAL_TPIU_SPPR_PARALLEL
  • AM_HAL_TPIU_SPPR_MANCHESTER
  • AM_HAL_TPIU_SPPR_NRZ

◆ ui32SetItmBaud

uint32_t am_hal_tpiu_config_t::ui32SetItmBaud

If ui32SetItmBaud is non-zero, the ITM frequency is set to the given frequency, and is based on a divide-by-8 HFRC TPIU clock.
If zero, other structure members are used to set the TPIU configuration.

◆ ui32TraceClkIn

uint32_t am_hal_tpiu_config_t::ui32TraceClkIn

MCU Control TRACECLKIN clock freq.

Valid values for ui32TraceClkIn are:

  • AM_HAL_TPIU_TRACECLKIN_6MHZ
  • AM_HAL_TPIU_TRACECLKIN_3MHZ
  • AM_HAL_TPIU_TRACECLKIN_1_5MHZ
  • AM_HAL_TPIU_TRACECLKIN_750KHZ
